new.it_will_be_impossible_for_a_third_party_: It will be impossible for a third-party to see which vote a user has cast.
new.the_voters_will_be_required_to_then_auth: Voters will be required to then authenticate with their credentials and password once they wish to vote.
new.the_voters_will_need_preregister_before_: <0>Voters will need to pre-register before the starting date</0> in order to get an authentication password.

home.a_fully_anonymous_voting_system_ensuring: Use Vocdoni without limits and free of charge until 15th of October 2021 to organize votes and meet all your governance needs. After that you can continue with a free plan or opt for a paid plan.
home.free_until_end_2021: ->  Free until the end of 2021, then you can choose a free or paid plan.
home.make_sure_your_members_have_access_to_th: Make sure your members have access to the financial report, the budget or other documents to be approved using Vocdoni.
home.tired_of_using_a_thousand: Tired of using a thousand tools to manage your organization? Vocdoni Platform is the all-in-one solution to boost the participation in your entity with ease, safety and the peace of mind of being GDPR-compliant by default.
